Name: TOXIKK™
About the game: FRAG LIKE IT'S 1999 TOXIKK™ plays as if today's military and MOBA shooters never existed: The game combines the simple and intuitive mechanics of old-school FPS giants with a fresh setting, slick graphics and our vision to carefully evolve the genre with some new ideas elaborated with Arena-FPS enthusiasts. TRY TOXIKK™ FOR FREE Note that the Free Edition does NOT HAVE ANY COMPETITIVE DISADVANTAGES versus the Full Game and is NOT some micro-transaction fueled F2P crap, but simply a classic shareware version / demo of the full game. If you decide to buy the Full Game, you really get the FULL game (i.e. ALL customizations and ALL features). * ALL MAPS CAN BE UNLOCKED THROUGH XP ** LIMITED TO MULTIPLAYER ACHIEVEMENTS QUESTIONS? Meet the community on our Discord live Chat:
